summary: Used to formally verify algorithms developed for SiFIve, contributed to the Coq Standard Library, and released packages on the Coq Package Index.

entry.title: Haskell
entry.body:
Level: Fluent
Experience: 7 years
summary: Used to model peripheral devices while developing processors at SiFive. Primary extraction target for programs written in Gallina.

entry.title: RISC-V

entry.body: Developed an open source RISC-V processor using the Kami modeling language at SiFive.
